fields.headline: Book ahead
fields.bodyText: Race is on at Zermatt Zermatt goes crazy on February 5 for the annual Luttman Johnson race, when skiers and boarders bomb around the resort's unrivalled mountain restaurants, some more seriously than others. Seven nights at the Chalet Matterhorn costs £569 with Total Holidays (08701 633633, skitotal.com) including Gatwick flights (supplements for Birmingham and Manchester). Peru sets its sights on the sun The ancient Peruvian ceremony of Inti Raymi - the festival of the sun - has been revived as a pageant with hundreds of local Incas playing the parts of priests, nobles and soldiers heading in procession from the sun temple at Cusco to welcome the winter solstice. The ceremony can be witnessed on a nine-day highlights of Peru tour costing £1,545 with Cox & Kings (01235 824404, coxandkings.co.uk). Shopping frenzy Shop until you drop in Dubai, the home of duty-free bargains. The Dubai shopping festival, from January 15 to February 15, features promotions and bargains galore. And the Gulf temperatures are at their most beguiling. Five nights' half-board at the Arabian Court from £1,240 with African Odyssey (01242 224482, africanodyssey.co.uk).
